\pard\cf1\f0\fs24\lang1033 My talk. 22-03-2021\par
\par
such as\par
to take a job that pays well but interferers with our worship.\par
to focus our efforts on something.\par
personal pursuits - \f1\lang1049\'eb\'e8\'f7\'ed\'fb\'e5 \'f1\'f2\'f0\'e5\'ec\'eb\'e5\'ed\'e8\'ff\par
\f0\lang1033 pursuits \f1\lang1049 - \'ef\'f0\'e5\'f1\'eb\'e5\'e4\'ee\'e2\'e0\'ed\'e8\'e5, \'f1\'f2\'f0\'e5\'ec\'eb\'e5\'ed\'e8\'e5.\par
what could happen if we began to \f0\lang1033 [do something]\par
\f1\lang1049\'f1\'ee\'e3\'eb\'e0\'f1\'ee\'e2\'e0\'ed\'e8\'e5 \'e2\'f0\'e5\'ec\'e5\'ed\'e8. \f0\lang1033 could happen --- began\par
array of entertainment options\par
array - \f1\lang1049\'ec\'ed\'ee\'e6\'e5\'f1\'f2\'e2\'ee\par
Consequently - \'ea\'e0\'ea \'f1\'eb\'e5\'e4\'f1\'f2\'e2\'e8\'e5\par
\f0\lang1033 that is why I did something\f1\lang1049\par
